root.name: Pangya: Fantasy Golf
root.description: The game features the nine golf courses of Pangya Island, 18 little golfers, and more customization options. Aside from golf, you can trick out your characters in all sorts of accessories, and the PSP version boasts thousands of unlockable accessories, outfits, and pieces of equipment. The game has many single player modes, from story mode to tournaments, along with single team multiplayer tournaments for up to 8 players.
